dao.name: QRY_DEPOSIT_MN_DEPOSIT_NOS
dao.statement: select d.deposit_nos , d.alt_nam , d.BANLANCE_AMT , d.UNIINV_STA , d.ID_COD , d.HAND_NOS , rf.type1_nam from deposit_mn d,dps_type1_rf rf where d.athena_id = rf.athena_id and d.athena_id = :athena_id and d.hotel_cod = :hotel_cod and group_cod in (select group_cod from rspt_rf r where Athena_id = :athena_id and hotel_cod = :hotel_cod and sys_cod = 'HC' and rownum = 1)
